name: Midnight Monsoon
description:
A small, short game I made based around the Gilles Deleuze's concept of the relative and absolute out-of-frame or out-of-field, which basically refers to the literal physical space outside the frame as well as the overarching context that is going on in the world within the frame, but isn't explicitly shown.

Font used - Lunchtime Doubly So by codeman38

CONTROLS

W,A,S,D or Arrow keys to move, F to Interact
